data.lyric:
[ti:Faith (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Faith (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:10.58]Lyrics by：Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Leland Tyler Wayne
[00:21.16]Composed by：Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Ahmad Balshe/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Leland Tyler Wayne
[00:31.75]Light a blunt up with the flame
[00:34.43]Put that c*****e on a plate
[00:37.18]Molly with the purple rain
[00:40.81]'Cause I lost my faith
[00:42.67]So I cut away the pain uh
[00:45.32]Got it swimming in my veins
[00:48.09]Now my mind is outta place yeah uh
[00:51.70]'Cause I lost my faith
[00:53.77]And I feel everything
[00:56.65]I feel everything from my body to my soul
[01:02.24]No no
[01:04.75]Well I feel everything
[01:07.55]When I'm coming down is the most I feel alone
[01:12.98]No no
[01:16.04]I've been sober for a year now it's time for me
[01:18.64]To go back to my old ways don't you cry for me
[01:21.49]Thought I'd be a better man but I lied to me and to you
[01:25.24]I take half a Xan' and I still stay awake
[01:28.36]All my demons wanna pull me to my grave
[01:31.07]I choose Vegas if they offer heaven's gate
[01:33.66]I tried to love but you know I'd never stay
[01:36.28]I'd never stay
[01:37.63]But if I OD I want you to OD right beside me
[01:42.29]I want you to follow right behind me
[01:45.01]I want you to hold me while I'm smiling
[01:47.43]While I'm dying
[01:48.64]And if you know me
[01:50.31]When I go missing you know where to find me
[01:53.23]Driving down the boulevard is blinding
[01:55.98]Always blinded by the desert lights and
[01:58.37]I'm alive when I feel everything
[02:01.98]I feel everything from my body to my soul
[02:07.69]No no
[02:10.16]Girl I feel everything
[02:13.12]When I'm coming down is the most I feel alone
[02:18.51]No no
[02:20.99]I lost my faith
[02:24.36]I'm losing my religion every day
[02:30.05]Time hasn't been kind to me I pray
[02:35.07]When I look inside the mirror and see someone I love
[02:40.47]Oh someone I love
[02:43.77]Faith
[02:46.27]I'm losing my religion every day
[02:51.88]Time hasn't been kind to me I pray
[02:56.86]When I look inside the mirror and see someone I love
[03:02.28]Oh someone I love
[03:37.54]I ended up in the back of a flashing car
[03:47.08]With the city shining on my face
[03:52.85]The lights are blinding me again
[03:59.44]I ended up in the back of a flashing car
[04:08.96]With the city shining on my face
[04:14.71]The lights are blinding me again
[04:21.27]I ended up
[04:24.30]I ended up
[04:25.36]In the back of a flashing car
[04:28.96]Back of a flashing car
data.trans:
[ti:Faith (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:10.58]//
[00:21.16]//
[00:31.75]用火焰点燃一根烟
[00:34.43]把那种东西放在盘子里
[00:37.18]带着紫色药片
[00:40.81]因为我失去了信念
[00:42.67]所以我抹去了痛苦
[00:45.32]让我热血沸腾
[00:48.09]现在我的思绪混乱不堪
[00:51.70]因为我失去了信念
[00:53.77]我感受到了一切
[00:56.65]我感受到了一切从我的身体到我的灵魂
[01:02.24]不不
[01:04.75]我感受到了一切
[01:07.55]当我情绪低落时我感觉最孤单
[01:12.98]不
[01:16.04]我已经清醒了一年现在是我的时候了
[01:18.64]回到从前的样子你不要为我哭泣
[01:21.49]以为我会成为更好的男人但我骗了自己也骗了你
[01:25.24]我吞下半片药依然保持清醒
[01:28.36]我的心魔都想把我拉入坟墓
[01:31.07]我选择维加斯如果他们提供天堂之门
[01:33.66]我试着去爱可你知道我不会留下来
[01:36.28]我绝不会留下
[01:37.63]但如果我服药过量我希望你陪在我身边
[01:42.29]我希望你跟在我身后
[01:45.01]我想要你在我微笑的时候抱着我
[01:47.43]当我奄奄一息时
[01:48.64]如果你了解我
[01:50.31]当我失踪时你知道去哪里找我
[01:53.23]行驶在林荫大道上耀眼夺目
[01:55.98]总是被沙漠的光芒蒙蔽双眼
[01:58.37]当我感受到一切我就充满活力
[02:01.98]我感受到了一切从我的身体到我的灵魂
[02:07.69]不
[02:10.16]姑娘我感同身受
[02:13.12]当我情绪低落时我感觉最孤单
[02:18.51]不
[02:20.99]我失去了信念
[02:24.36]我每天都失去信仰
[02:30.05]时间对我并不仁慈我祈祷
[02:35.07]当我照镜子看到我爱的人
[02:40.47]我爱的人
[02:43.77]信仰
[02:46.27]我每天都失去信仰
[02:51.88]时间对我并不仁慈我祈祷
[02:56.86]当我照镜子看到我爱的人
[03:02.28]我爱的人
[03:37.54]我坐在一辆闪亮的车里
[03:47.08]城市的光芒照耀着我的脸庞
[03:52.85]光芒再次蒙蔽我的双眼
[03:59.44]我坐在一辆闪亮的车里
[04:08.96]城市的光芒照耀着我的脸庞
[04:14.71]光芒再次蒙蔽我的双眼
[04:21.27]我最后
[04:24.30]我最后
[04:25.36]在闪烁的汽车后座上
[04:28.96]一辆闪亮的汽车后面
